headlineSecondary: Capture a moment in time with a custom star map.
primaryBoxText:
Buying gifts can be a stressful, costly and time consuming process. But where’s the fun, the thought and the sentiment in that?

What about a gift that really shows how much you care? One that will be treasured and appreciated forever?

Our star maps are original, affordable and incredibly thoughtful. It is the gift that keeps on giving.
customer1Says: Amazing! It is so much more beautiful than I imagined. Clear Recommendation ❤️
customer2Says: Beautiful! Great quality and really quick delivery.
customer3Says: Beautiful product and a truly caring customer service.
premiumQuality: A Product To Make You Happy
posterDetail:
- Premium paper & print
- Frame available in cart
forexDetail:
- The gallery-style eyecatcher
- No frame required, hanger included
pdfHeadline: Digital files to print by yourself
pdfDetail:
- Download link immediately available after purchasing
- Printable up to 50 x 70 cm
howWeDoItText:
Quick delivery

Posters are shipped within one working day, framed posters and panel prints within two. We deliver your package right to your doorstep or directly to the presentee.

A Joy to unpack

Gift a poster in a high quality package. Our parcels are made with love and a joy to unpack.
astronomicallyValidText: Every starmap is automatically matched with the Hippocaros Millenium Star Atlas.
alwaysPerfectPresent: The perfect gift for every occasion!
discountDisclaimer: The cheapest item is automatically deducted from the total price at checkout. Cannot be combined with other discounts.
meta: Create a custom star map with the night sky of your special moment.
